title: Los Angeles/Northwest
name: Yai
content: By general learned agreement, the most authentic Thai food in the States can be found at "the Thai restaurant behind the 7-11 on Hollywood Boulevard by the 101." That's how it is known. If you are not from L.A., this can also serve as an introduction to L.A.-style directions. The Pad Thai here is light and perfumed and the curries hot enough to kill. And by ''authentic'', that's exactly what is meant...don't expect any catering to tastes here.
